Event Video & Conferences

Premium coverage for conferences and B2B events. CEO interviews, reports, and full recordings.

Organizing a key conference or corporate summit? Video isn't just a memory; it's a business asset. Professional coverage builds trust with stakeholders and attracts sponsors for future editions.

I specialize in B2B events where professionalism and discretion are paramount. I capture interviews with speakers, VIP guests, and CEOs. The result is not just a highlight reel, but content that sells your brand year-round.

In partnership with SocialVids, we handle large international events with multi-person crews.

What's included?

  • Executive Interviews
  • Highlight Reels
  • Drone Footage
  • Express PR Delivery

Frequently Asked Questions

Do you film outside of London?

Yes, I film across the UK and internationally (primarily Prague).

How quickly will I receive the event video?

I offer express delivery - short clips for social media the same evening, complete aftermovie within 5-7 days.

Do I need more videographers?

For smaller events, I am enough. For large events, I can provide a full team.

Does the price include drone footage?

Drone footage is for an extra fee. We'll discuss this during the consultation.

I create videos. Reels, TikTok & Full Production. Partner SocialVids.
